page.title: 10RELIGION
page.content: {CHURCHES} {ST.GEORGES CHURCH OF ENGLAND} Built in 1142 AD.Diocese was Worcester,now Gloucester.Has a central tower,the chancel dating from 1142 and the north isle with vestry dating 1336 The church is governed by a Parochial Council of 21 members.There are 184 on Electoral Roll.Clubs shown elsewhere. {UNITED REFORMED CHURCH} The Church has been in existence since 1900.In 1957 the new church off Moorfield Road was built mainly by, and through the efforts of, the then Minister.Ap.50 people attend regularly {ST.PETER'S ROMAN CATHOLIC CHURCH } The original Hall,used for worship and built in 1955,was replaced by the new Church in 1967.Mass is said every day,twice on Sunday.There are app.300 parishoners.The SVP,a Pastorial group meet each week,as do Legion of Mary.
